divs: Sighting DetailsI WENT OUT SIDE TO FEED CATS I WAS STANDING IN MY FRONT YARD. LOOKING INTO SOUTHERN SKY I SPOTED A BRIGHT WHITE LIGHT, BRIGHTER AND BIGGER THAN A STAR. THE OJECT WAS NOT MOVING. I SAW A FLASHING STROBE LIKE LIGHT IN THE UPPER RIGHT, THE LIGHT WAS GREEN IN COLOR. A FLASHING RED LIGHT FROM THE BOTTOM CENTER OF THE OBJECT WAS SMALLER THAN THE GREEN. NO SOUND WAS HEARD. I WENT BACK INTO THE HOUSE AFTER 25 MIN. THE OBJECT WAS STILL IN SKY AND NOT MOVING. THE SKY WAS CLEAR FOR THE MOST PART WIND WAS LITTLE OR NONE. I DID NOT KNOW WHAT TO THINK AT FIRST UNTILL I SAW THE GREEN AND RED LIGHTS. IF IT HAD NOT BEEN FOR THE BRIGHTNESS OF THE WHITE LIGHT AND THE FLASHING OR STROBING OF THE GREEN AND RED I WOULD HAVE THOUGHT IT WAS JUST A VERY BRIGHT STAR. I SENT AN E-MAIL TO THE LOCAL TV NEWS AND TO N.O.R.A.D.E. THERE HAS BEEN NO RESPONCE AT THIS TIME.
Summary: BRIGHT LIGHT, FLASHING GREEN UP RIGHT,FLASHING RED BOTTOM CENTER NOT MOVING.
trends: There have been 17 other sightings in Ashland
There were no other sightings in Ashland on or around April 22nd 2008
